items.title: ‘Hollywood Squares’ Remake Shows Inanity Of Our Celebrity Class
items.description: With its vapid and superficial approach, the show reveals celebrities as trite, even boring.

items.title: Yes, Republican Leaders Have The Authoritiy To Rein In Birthright Citizenship
items.description: The framers added the Fourteenth Amendment's 'subject to the jurisdiction thereof' clause for an important, specific reason.

items.title: Trump Proved Democrats Want A Permanent Underclass Of Illegal Migrants To Exploit
items.description: You’re now angrier at the poor people chasing a lie than the people who created the fable for them to believe in.

items.title: How Trump And The L.A. Fires Broke The DEI Spell
items.description: Many wonder if the L.A. fires will be the tipping point in the demise of 'diversity, equity, and inclusion' (DEI).

items.title: Only Congress And The President Can Save College Sports
items.description: Saving college sports this time will require comprehensive federal legislation that touches some of the most complex areas of law.
